733299f-a.title: Street scenes - Fortune telling.
733299f-a.text:
The bird of chance; prepared to foretell all in the future. Seen
at Grand and Ludlow Streets, where it is still quite popular.
About 1923.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
733299f-a.folder: Grand Street and Ludlow Street, Manhattan, N.Y.

720099f-b.title: Manhattan: Grand Street - Ludlow Street
720099f-b.text:
(1)
334 and 332 Grand Street, at and adjoining the N.W. corner of Lud-
low Street. No. 334 jcorner house) also faces on Ludlow Street.
April 7, 1929.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(2)
The same, at a later date, showing a more extensive view of the west ]
side of Ludlew Street. Note the pineapple drinks vendoe in the foreground]
at the N.W. corner.
April 25, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.

732365f-a.title: Occupations - Peddlers - Clothing - Hosiery.
732365f-a.text:
Ladies hosiery displayed on cart, by peddler; on Grand Street, between
Ludlow and Essex Streets.
May 8, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
